LayoutNode.Content: The proceedings of ESA symposia appear in the series Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS), Springer-Verlag Heidelberg. For an overview see the computer science bibliography.
LayoutNode.SRC: The proceedings of ESA symposia appear in the series Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS), Springer-Verlag Heidelberg. For an overview see the computer science bibliography.

LayoutNode.Content: The proceedings of the first two WAE workshops appeared only as technical reports of the organizing institutions. The proceedings of more recent workshops appeared in the series Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS), Springer-Verlag Heidelberg. For an overview see the computer science bibliography.
LayoutNode.SRC: The proceedings of the first two WAE workshops appeared only as technical reports of the organizing institutions. The proceedings of more recent workshops appeared in the series Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS), Springer-Verlag Heidelberg. For an overview see the computer science bibliography.

LayoutNode.Content: Since the year 2000 WAE is collocated with ESA. In 2001 it was decided to incorporate WAE into ESA, starting with ESA 2002.
LayoutNode.SRC: Since the year 2000 WAE is collocated with ESA. In 2001 it was decided to incorporate WAE into ESA, starting with ESA 2002.
